text:
William Raymond Barry (October 4, 1928 – August 28, 2018) was an American-born Canadian professional ice hockey player. He played 18 games in the National Hockey League. He also played for the Boston Bruins and the Hershey Bears in the 1951-52 season.
Barry was born in Revere, Massachusetts and raised in Edmonton, Alberta. He died on August 28, 2018 in Calgary, aged 89.
